thread.title: Biomedical scientist faces misconduct charges after calling NHS committee evil in Facebook post
thread.title_full: Biomedical scientist faces misconduct charges after calling NHS committee evil in Facebook post

title: Biomedical scientist faces misconduct charges after calling NHS committee evil in Facebook post
text:
Biomedical scientist faces misconduct charges after calling NHS committee 'evil' in Facebook post 
Wales Online Friday 23rd October, 2015 
A biomedical scientist faces misconduct charges and could be found unfit to practise after referring to an NHS committee as "evil" in a Facebook post. Elisabeth Brealey, who works for Betsi Cadwaladr University Health Board (BCUHB) in North Wales, appeared at a Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC) conduct and competence committee hearing on Thursday. The mum-of-one posted a string of messages on Facebook between May 2011 and April 2014 criticising...
